articles.description: Ratan Tata, who recently celebrated his 85th birthday, reminisced the bond shared with his brother Jimmy. The businessman also shared a 1945 image of his brother and himself with the former's 7 million Instagram followers on Tuesday. Know who Jimmy Tata is.
